entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump And he insulted a nurse who told the truth about PPE. Trump can’t con the pandemic out of existence. Everyone knows people who’ve needed testing & couldn’t get it. We all hear from doctors & nurses on the front lines who don’t have enough PPE. #Covid19 #NationalNursesDay
